Sports and Clubs: Cricket; General Secretary of Vidhan Sabha Club of Rajasthan, Jaipur;organised many matches
Social And Cultural Activities: , Rajasthan Branch of All India Adivasi Development Council, Awarded Rana Punja Award by Maharana Mewar Foundation, Udaipur.Has been actively participating in social work for the upliftment of society and solving social problems; have contributed to preserve Indian culture
Favourite Pastime and Recreation: Watching various programmes on TV especially comedy, laughter and satire based programmes
Educational Qualifications: B.A. Educated at Vardhman Mahavir University, Rajasthan
Other Information: My father late Devendra Kumar Meena has been a Congress MLA in Rajasthan Vidhan Sabha for four terms; started political carrier as Sarpanch in 1988 and thereafter elected as MLA in 1993; served as President, All India Adivasi Development Council; organised All India Adivasi Conference; INC incharge of Surendra Nagar,Panchmahal and Balsad districts of Gujurat
